This has nothing to do with speed, it's just convenient to be able to run
j=
ust the one test method you are currently developing or debugging.

For exa=
mple, the twenty tests could be exercising the same area of your code
but o=
nly that one test fails, so you really don't want to waste time having
your=
 breakpoint go off 19 times for tests that you know are passing.

-- 
Cedri=
